TagHelpers.Name: Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.SfUploader
TagHelpers.Documentation:
<summary>
            The uploader component is useful to upload images, documents, and other files to server.
            The component is the extended version of HTML5 that is uploaded with multiple file selection, auto upload, drag and drop, progress bar, preload files, and validation.
            </summary>
            <summary>
            Specifies the list of files that will be preloaded on rendering of uploader component.
            </summary>
            <summary>
            Specifies the list of files that will be preloaded on rendering of uploader component.
            </summary>
            <summary>
            The uploader component is useful to upload images, documents, and other files to server.
            The component is the extended version of HTML5 that is uploaded with multiple file selection, auto upload, drag and drop, progress bar, preload files, and validation.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ID
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the id of the Uploader component.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ChildContent
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the content that has to be passed.
            </summary>
            <exclude />

BoundAttributes.Name: AllowedExtensions
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the extensions of the file types allowed in the Uploader component and pass the extensions
            with comma separators.
            <para> For example,if you want to upload specific image files, pass `AllowedExtensions` as ".jpg,.png".</para>
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: EnableHtmlSanitizer
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets whether to prevent the cross site scripting code in filename or not.
            </summary>
            <value>
            <c>true</c>, if the component prevents the cross site scripting code in filename; otherwise,<c>false</c>. The default value is <c>true</c>.       
            </value>
            <remarks>
            The Enable HtmlSanitizer property removes the cross-site scripting code or functions from the filename and shows the validation error message to the user.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: AutoUpload
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            By default, the Uploader component initiates automatic upload when the files are added in upload queue.
            <para>If you want to manipulate the files before uploading to server, disable the AutoUpload property.</para>
            <para>The buttons "upload" and "clear" will be hided from file list when AutoUpload property is true.</para>
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: CssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the CSS class name that can be appended with root element of the Uploader.
            One or more custom CSS classes can be added to a Uploader.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: DirectoryUpload
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies a boolean value that indicates whether the folder of files can be browsed in the Uploader component.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: DropArea
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the drop target to handle the drag-and-drop upload.
            By default, the Uploader creates wrapper around file input that will act as drop target.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: DropEffect
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the drag operation effect to the Uploader component.
            <para> Possible values are .</para>
            <list type="bullet">
            <item>
            <term>Copy</term>
            </item>
            <item>
            <term>Move</term>
            </item>
            <item>
            <term>Link</term>
            </item>
            <item>
            <term>None</term>
            </item>
            </list>
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: EnablePersistence
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Enable or disable persisting Uploader state between page reloads. If enabled, the `Files` state will be persisted.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: EnableRtl
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Enable or disable rendering Uploader in right to left direction.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Enabled
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies a boolean value that indicates whether the Uploader allows the user to interact with it.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: HtmlAttributes
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            <para>You can add the additional html attributes such as styles, class, and more to the root element.</para>
            <para>If you configured both property and equivalent html attributes, then the component considers the property value.</para>
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: InputAttributes
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            You can add the additional input attributes such as disabled, value, and more to the root element.
            If you configured both property and equivalent input attribute, then the component considers the property value.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: MaxFileSize
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the maximum allowed file size to be uploaded in bytes.
            The property used to make sure that you cannot upload too large files.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: MinFileSize
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the minimum file size to be uploaded in bytes.
            The property used to make sure that you cannot upload empty files and small files.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: AllowMultiple
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies a boolean value that indicates whether the multiple files can be browsed or dropped simultaneously in the Uploader component.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: SequentialUpload
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            By default, the file Uploader component is processing the multiple files simultaneously.
            <para>If SequentialUpload property is enabled, the file upload component performs the upload one after the other.</para>
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ShowFileList
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies a boolean value that indicates whether the default file list can be rendered.
            The property used to prevent default file list and design own template for file list.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: TabIndex
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the tab order of the component.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Template

<summary>
            Specifies the HTML string that used to customize the content of each file in the list.
            </summary>

            Triggers when the content of input has changed and gets focus-out.
            </summary>

TagHelpers.Name: Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.SfUploader
TagHelpers.Documentation:
<summary>
            The uploader component is useful to upload images, documents, and other files to server.
            The component is the extended version of HTML5 that is uploaded with multiple file selection, auto upload, drag and drop, progress bar, preload files, and validation.
            </summary>
            <summary>
            Specifies the list of files that will be preloaded on rendering of uploader component.
            </summary>
            <summary>
            Specifies the list of files that will be preloaded on rendering of uploader component.
            </summary>
            <summary>
            The uploader component is useful to upload images, documents, and other files to server.
            The component is the extended version of HTML5 that is uploaded with multiple file selection, auto upload, drag and drop, progress bar, preload files, and validation.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ID
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the id of the Uploader component.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ChildContent
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the content that has to be passed.
            </summary>
            <exclude />

BoundAttributes.Name: AllowedExtensions
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the extensions of the file types allowed in the Uploader component and pass the extensions
            with comma separators.
            <para> For example,if you want to upload specific image files, pass `AllowedExtensions` as ".jpg,.png".</para>
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: EnableHtmlSanitizer
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets whether to prevent the cross site scripting code in filename or not.
            </summary>
            <value>
            <c>true</c>, if the component prevents the cross site scripting code in filename; otherwise,<c>false</c>. The default value is <c>true</c>.       
            </value>
            <remarks>
            The Enable HtmlSanitizer property removes the cross-site scripting code or functions from the filename and shows the validation error message to the user.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: AutoUpload
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            By default, the Uploader component initiates automatic upload when the files are added in upload queue.
            <para>If you want to manipulate the files before uploading to server, disable the AutoUpload property.</para>
            <para>The buttons "upload" and "clear" will be hided from file list when AutoUpload property is true.</para>
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: CssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the CSS class name that can be appended with root element of the Uploader.
            One or more custom CSS classes can be added to a Uploader.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: DirectoryUpload
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies a boolean value that indicates whether the folder of files can be browsed in the Uploader component.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: DropArea
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the drop target to handle the drag-and-drop upload.
            By default, the Uploader creates wrapper around file input that will act as drop target.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: DropEffect
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the drag operation effect to the Uploader component.
            <para> Possible values are .</para>
            <list type="bullet">
            <item>
            <term>Copy</term>
            </item>
            <item>
            <term>Move</term>
            </item>
            <item>
            <term>Link</term>
            </item>
            <item>
            <term>None</term>
            </item>
            </list>
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: EnablePersistence
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Enable or disable persisting Uploader state between page reloads. If enabled, the `Files` state will be persisted.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: EnableRtl
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Enable or disable rendering Uploader in right to left direction.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Enabled
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies a boolean value that indicates whether the Uploader allows the user to interact with it.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: HtmlAttributes
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            <para>You can add the additional html attributes such as styles, class, and more to the root element.</para>
            <para>If you configured both property and equivalent html attributes, then the component considers the property value.</para>
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: InputAttributes
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            You can add the additional input attributes such as disabled, value, and more to the root element.
            If you configured both property and equivalent input attribute, then the component considers the property value.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: MaxFileSize
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the maximum allowed file size to be uploaded in bytes.
            The property used to make sure that you cannot upload too large files.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: MinFileSize
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the minimum file size to be uploaded in bytes.
            The property used to make sure that you cannot upload empty files and small files.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: AllowMultiple

            Specifies a boolean value that indicates whether the multiple files can be browsed or dropped simultaneously in the Uploader component.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: SequentialUpload

            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the content that has to be passed.
            </summary>
            <exclude />

BoundAttributes.Name: ChunkSize
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the ChunkSize to split the large file into chunks, and upload it to the server in a sequential order.
            <para>If the ChunkSize property has value, the Uploader enables the chunk upload by default.
            It must be specified in bytes value.</para>
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: RemoveUrl
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the URL of remove action that receives the file information and handle the remove operation in server.
            <para>The remove action type must be POST request and define "RemoveFileNames" attribute to get file information that will be removed.
            This property is optional.</para>
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: RetryAfterDelay
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the delay time in milliseconds that the automatic retry happens after the delay.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: RetryCount
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the number of retries that the Uploader can perform on the file failed to upload.
            By default, the Uploader set 3 as maximum retries. This property must be specified to prevent infinity looping.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: SaveUrl
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the URL of save action that will receive the upload files and save in the server.
            <para>The save action type must be POST request and define the argument as same input name used to render the component.
            The upload operations could not perform without this property.</para>
            </summary>

TagHelpers.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the Uploader Events of the component.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnActionComplete
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Triggers after all the selected files has processed to upload successfully or failed to server.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: BeforeRemove
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Triggers on remove the uploaded file. The event used to get confirm before remove the file from server.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: BeforeUpload
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Triggers when the upload process before. This event is used to add additional parameter with upload request.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnCancel
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Fires if cancel the chunk file uploading.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ValueChange
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Triggers when changes occur in uploaded file list by selecting or dropping files.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnChunkFailure
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Fires if the chunk file failed to upload.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnChunkSuccess
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Fires when the chunk file uploaded successfully.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnChunkUploadStart
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Fires when every chunk upload process gets started. This event is used to add additional parameter with upload request.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnClear
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Triggers before clearing the items in file list when clicking "clear".
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Created
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Triggers when the component is created.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnFailure
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Triggers when the AJAX request fails on uploading or removing files.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnFileListRender
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Triggers before rendering each file item from the file list in a page.
            It helps to customize specific file item structure.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Paused
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Fires if pause the chunk file uploading.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Progressing
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Triggers when uploading a file to the server using the AJAX request.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnRemove
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Triggers on removing the uploaded file. The event used to get confirm before removing the file from server.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnResume
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Fires if resume the paused chunk file upload.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: FileSelected
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Triggers after selecting or dropping the files by adding the files in upload queue.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Success
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Triggers when the AJAX request gets success on uploading files or removing files.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnUploadStart
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Triggers when the upload process gets started. This event is used to add additional parameter with upload request.
            </summary>

            <description>The floating label always floats above the TextBox.</description>
            </item>
            <item>

            </item>

            </summary>

TagHelpers.Name: Syncfusion.Blazor.Popups.DialogAnimationSettings
TagHelpers.Documentation:
<summary>
            The class provides data for the animation to Dialog.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Delay
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the delay in milliseconds to start the animation.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Duration
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the duration in milliseconds that the animation takes to open or close the dialog.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Effect
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the animation name that should be applied on while opening and closing the dialog.
            If the user sets Fade animation, the dialog will open with the `FadeIn` effect and close with the `FadeOut` effect.
            The following are the list of animation effects available to configure to the dialog:
            1. Fade
            2. FadeZoom
            3. FlipLeftDown
            4. FlipLeftUp
            5. FlipRightDown
            6. FlipRightUp
            7. FlipXDown
            8. FlipXUp
            9. FlipYLeft
            10. FlipYRight
            11. SlideBottom
            12. SlideLeft
            13. SlideRight
            14. SlideTop
            15. Zoom
            16. None.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: IconPosition
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Positions the icon before or after the text content in the Button.
            The possible values are: Left: The icon will be positioned to the left of the text content.
            Right: The icon will be positioned to the right of the text content.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: IsPrimary
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Allows the appearance of the Button to be enhanced and visually appealing when set to `true`.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: IsToggle
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Makes the Button toggle, when set to `true`.
            When you click it, the state changes from normal to active.
            </summary>

            Defines the class/multiple classes separated by a space for the Button that is used to include an icon.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: IconPosition
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Positions the icon before or after the text content in the Button.
            The possible values are: Left: The icon will be positioned to the left of the text content.
            Right: The icon will be positioned to the right of the text content.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: IsPrimary
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Allows the appearance of the Button to be enhanced and visually appealing when set to `true`.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: IsToggle
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Makes the Button toggle, when set to `true`.
            When you click it, the state changes from normal to active.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnClick
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Event triggers when `click` the dialog button.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Type
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the type of the button.
            Possible values are Button, Submit, and Reset.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: IsFlat
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the Flat appearance of the dialog buttons.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: HtmlAttributes
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<exclude />
            <summary>
            You can add the additional html attributes such as id, title etc., to the button element.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Resizing

            </summary>

TagHelpers.Name: Syncfusion.Blazor.Popups.SfDialog
TagHelpers.Documentation:
<summary>
            Represents the dialog component that displays the information and gets input from the user.
            Two types of dialog components are `Modal and Modeless(non-modal)` depending on their interaction with the parent application.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ID
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the unique identifier.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ChildContent
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Sets content for the Dialog element including HTML support and its customizations.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: AllowDragging
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the value whether the dialog component can be dragged by the end-user.
            The dialog allows a user to drag by selecting the header and dragging it for re-positioning the dialog.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: CloseOnEscape
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the Boolean value whether the dialog can be closed on pressing the escape (ESC) key.
            that is used to control the dialog's closing behavior.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Content
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the value that can be displayed in the dialog's content section.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: CssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the CSS class name that can be appended with the root element of the dialog.
            One or more custom CSS classes can be added to a dialog.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: EnableResize
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the value whether the dialog component can be resized by the end-user.
            If the enableResize is true, the dialog component creates a grip to resize it in a diagonal direction.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ResizeHandles
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the resize handles direction in the dialog component that can be resized by the end-user.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: EnableRtl
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Enable or disable rendering component in the right to left (RTL) direction.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: FooterTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the template value that can be displayed with the dialog's footer area.
            This is an optional property and can be used only when the footer is occupied with information or custom components.
            By default, the footer is configured with the action buttons.
            If the footer template is configured to the dialog, the buttons property will be disabled.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Header
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the value that can be displayed in the dialog's title area that can be configured with a plain text.
            The dialog will be displayed without the header if the header property is null.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Height
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the height of the dialog component.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: HtmlAttributes
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            You can add the additional Html attributes such as id, title, etc., to the dialog element.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: IsModal
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the Boolean value whether the dialog can be displayed as modal or non-modal.
            `Modal`: It creates an overlay that disables interaction with the parent application and
             the user who should respond with modal before continuing with other applications.
            `Modeless`: It does not prevent user interaction with the parent application.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: MinHeight
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the min-height of the dialog component.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ShowCloseIcon
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the value that represents whether the close icon can be shown in the dialog’s title section.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Target
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the target element in which the dialog should be displayed.
            The default value is null, which refers to the `Document.body` element.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Visible
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the value that represents whether the dialog component is visible.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: VisibleChanged
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a callback of the bound value.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Width
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the width of the dialog.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ZIndex
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the z-order for rendering that determines whether the dialog is displayed
            in front or behind of another component.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: AllowPrerender
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets whether the Dialog element re-render or not when the Dialog gets open. true, if dialog component elements are maintained on the DOM when closing and opening it; otherwise, false.The default value is false. Disabling this property, the Dialog component DOM element will be destroyed when closing and re-rendered the dialog DOM element while opening it. Otherwise, the dialog will be shown when opening it and remain hidden while closing it when enabled.

TagHelpers.Name: Syncfusion.Blazor.Popups.SfDialogProvider
TagHelpers.Documentation:
<summary>
            DialogProvider is a target element where the built-in dialogs are shown using <see cref="M:Syncfusion.Blazor.Popups.SfDialogService.ConfirmAsync(System.String,System.String,Syncfusion.Blazor.Popups.DialogOptions)" />,
            <see cref="M:Syncfusion.Blazor.Popups.SfDialogService.AlertAsync(System.String,System.String,Syncfusion.Blazor.Popups.DialogOptions)" /> and <see cref="M:Syncfusion.Blazor.Popups.SfDialogService.PromptAsync(System.String,System.String,Syncfusion.Blazor.Popups.DialogOptions)" /> 
            methods that are appended to this element. 
            </summary>
            <remarks>
            It is recommended to add this component in `MainLayout.razor` to show utility dialogs from anywhere in the application.
            If you add this to any particular page, the utility dialogs can then be displayed only for that page.
            </remarks>

TagHelpers.Name: Syncfusion.Blazor.Popups.SfTooltip
TagHelpers.Documentation:
<summary>
            The SfTooltip component displays a pop-up containing information or a message when you hover, click, focus, or touch an element.
            </summary>
            <summary>
            The SfTooltip component displays a pop-up containing information or a message when you hover, click, focus, or touch an element.
            </summary>
            <summary>
            The SfTooltip component displays a pop-up containing information or a message when you hover, click, focus, or touch an element.
            </summary>
            <summary>
            The SfTooltip component displays a pop-up containing information or a message when you hover, click, focus, or touch an element.
            </summary>
            <summary>
            The SfTooltip component displays a pop-up containing information or a message when you hover, click, focus, or touch an element.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Closed
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The event `Closed` will be fired when the Tooltip component gets closed.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Opened
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The event `Opened` will be fired after the Tooltip component gets opened.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnClose
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The event `OnClose` will be fired before the Tooltip hides from the screen.
            The Tooltip close can be prevented by setting the cancel argument value to true.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnCollision
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The event `OnCollision` will be fired for every collision fit calculation.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnOpen
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The event `OnOpen` will be fired before the Tooltip is displayed over the target element.
            When one of its arguments `cancel` is set to true, the Tooltip display can be prevented.
            This event is mainly used to refresh the Tooltip positions dynamically or to set customized styles in it and so on.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnRender
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The event `OnRender` will be fired before the Tooltip and its contents will be added to the DOM.
            When one of its arguments `cancel` is set to true, the Tooltip can be prevented from rendering on the page.
            This event is mainly used to customize the Tooltip before it shows up on the screen.
            For example, to load the AJAX content or to set new animation effects on the Tooltip, this event can be opted.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Created
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The event `Created` will be fired after the Tooltip component is created.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Destroyed
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The event `Destroyed` will be fired when the Tooltip component is destroyed.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ChildContent
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<exclude />
            <summary>
            Defines the content which has to be passed.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ID
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<exclude />
            <summary>
            Defines the Id of the Tooltip component.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Animation
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            It is used to customize the animation of the Tooltip while opening and closing.
            The animation property also allows you to set delay, duration, and various other effects of your choice.
            You can set the same or different animation options to the Tooltip when it is in the open or close state.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: CloseDelay
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            To close the Tooltip after a specified delay in millisecond.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Content
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            To display the content of the Tooltip which can be a string element.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: CssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            To customize the Tooltip which accepts the custom CSS class names that define specific
            user-defined styles and themes to be applied to the Tooltip element.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: EnableHtmlSanitizer
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            This property has been deprecated as we achieve this behavior by using ChildContent of render fragment type and and Content as a string value.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: EnablePersistence
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            As there are no properties required to persist in tooltip component, this property is deprecated.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: EnableRtl
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            To enable or disable the rendering component in the right to left direction.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: WindowCollision
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            It is used to set the collision target element as page viewport (window) or Tooltip element, when using the target.
            If this property is enabled, tooltip will perform the collision calculation between the target elements.
            and viewport(window) instead of Tooltip element.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Height
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            To set the height of the Tooltip component which accepts the string values.
            When the Tooltip content gets overflowed due to the height value, then the scroll mode will be enabled.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: IsSticky
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            To display the Tooltip in an open state until it is closed manually.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: MouseTrail
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            It allows the Tooltip to follow the mouse pointer moves over the specified target element.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OffsetX
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            It sets the space between the target and Tooltip element in X-axis.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OffsetY
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            It sets the space between the target and Tooltip element in Y-axis.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OpenDelay

<summary>
            To open the Tooltip after a specified delay in millisecond.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OpensOn
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            To determine the type of open mode to display the Tooltip content.
            The available open modes are Auto, Hover, Click, Focus, and Custom.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Position
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            To set the position of the Tooltip element with respect to the Target element.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ShowTipPointer
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            To show or hide the tip pointer of the Tooltip.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Target
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            To denote the target selector where the Tooltip needs to be displayed.
            The target element is considered as the parent container.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Container
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            It is used to set the container element in which the Tooltip’s pop-up will be appended.
            It's default value is `body`, in which the Tooltip’s pop-up will be appended.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: TipPointerPosition
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            It is used to customize the position of the tip pointer on the tooltip. The available options are Auto, Start, Middle, and End.
            When set to auto, the tip pointer gets auto adjusted within the space of the target's length and does not point outside.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Width
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            To set the width of the Tooltip component which accepts a string value.
            When set to auto, the Tooltip width gets auto adjusted to display its content within the viewable screen.
            </summary>

<summary>
            The SfTooltip component displays a pop-up containing information or a message when you hover, click, focus, or touch an element.
            </summary>

            The event `Closed` will be fired when the Tooltip component gets closed.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The event `Opened` will be fired after the Tooltip component gets opened.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnClose
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The event `OnClose` will be fired before the Tooltip hides from the screen.
            The Tooltip close can be prevented by setting the cancel argument value to true.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnCollision
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The event `OnCollision` will be fired for every collision fit calculation.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnOpen
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The event `OnOpen` will be fired before the Tooltip is displayed over the target element.
            When one of its arguments `cancel` is set to true, the Tooltip display can be prevented.
            This event is mainly used to refresh the Tooltip positions dynamically or to set customized styles in it and so on.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnRender
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The event `OnRender` will be fired before the Tooltip and its contents will be added to the DOM.
            When one of its arguments `cancel` is set to true, the Tooltip can be prevented from rendering on the page.
            This event is mainly used to customize the Tooltip before it shows up on the screen.
            For example, to load the AJAX content or to set new animation effects on the Tooltip, this event can be opted.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Created
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The event `Created` will be fired after the Tooltip component is created.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Destroyed

<summary>

            </summary>

TagHelpers.Name: Syncfusion.Blazor.Buttons.SfButton
TagHelpers.Documentation: Button is a graphical user interface that helps to triggers an event on its click action. It can contain a text, an icon, svg or both. Button content is either by specifying property or by specifying content within tag directive. In the below code example, a basic button is initialized with property. ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: ChildContent
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary> 
            Gets or sets a value that indicates the child content for the Button including HTML element. If the child content is not specified, button is rendered using <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Buttons.SfButton.Content" /> property. 
            </summary> 
            <value> 
            The template content. The default value is <c>null</c>. 
            </value> 
            <remarks> 
            The child content which is specified within <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Buttons.SfButton" /> tag directive is either a string or HTML Element. The string content is also specified using <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Buttons.SfButton.Content" /> property. 
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: Content
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary> 
            Gets or sets a value that indicates the content of Button component. 
            </summary> 
            <value> 
            Accepts a string value. The default value is <c>String.Empty</c>. 
            </value> 
            <remarks> 
            Set child content within <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Buttons.SfButton" /> tag directive, to render as HTML content. 
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: CssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary> 
            Gets or sets a value that indicates the CSS class string to customize the appearance of button. 
            </summary> 
            <value> 
            Accepts a CSS class string separated by space to customize the appearance of button. The default value is <c>String.Empty</c>. 
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: Disabled
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary> 
            Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to enable or disable the button. 
            </summary> 
            <value> 
            <c>true</c>, if the button component is disabled. The default value is <c>false</c>. 
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: EnableRtl
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary> 
            Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to enable or disable the right to left direction for button. 
            </summary> 
            <value> 
            <c>true</c>, if the right to left direction is enabled for button. The default value is <c>false</c>. 
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: IconCss
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary> 
            Gets or sets a value that indicates the CSS class string to include an icon or image for the button.  
            </summary> 
            <value> 
            Accepts a CSS class string separated by space to include an icon or image for the button. The default value is <c>String.Empty</c>. 
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: IconPosition
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary> 
            Gets or sets a value that indicates how to display icons in the button. 
            </summary> 
            <value> 
            One of the <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Buttons.SfButton.IconPosition" /> enumeration. The default value is <see cref="F:Syncfusion.Blazor.Buttons.IconPosition.Left" /> 
            </value> 
            <remarks> 
            If the <c>IconPosition</c> is <c>Left</c>, the icon will be placed left to the content of the button. 
            If the <c>IconPosition</c> is <c>Right</c>, the icon will be placed right to the content of the button. 
            If the <c>IconPosition</c> is <c>Top</c>, the icon will be placed above the content of the button. 
            If the <c>IconPosition</c> is <c>Bottom</c>, the icon will be placed below the content of the button. 
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: IsPrimary
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary> 
            Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to enable or disable the primary style for button. 
            </summary> 
            <value> 
            <c>true</c>, if the primary style is enabled for button component. The default value is <c>false</c>. 
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: IsToggle
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary> 
            Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to enable or disable the toggle option for button component. 
            </summary> 
            <value> 
            <c>true</c>, if the toggle option is enabled for button component. The default value is <c>false</c>. 
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets a a value that indicates the collection of additional attributes that will applied to the button container element. Additional attributes can be added by specifying as inline attributes or by specifying @attributes directive. In the below code example, button width has been specified as style attribute in tag directive. ]]>

TagHelpers.Documentation: The Blazor FAB Component (Floating Action Button) is an extension of that appears in front of all the contents of the page and performs the primary action. A simple FAB with text content. ]]> FAB with icon. ]]> FAB with icon and text. ]]> FAB with info button style. ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: IsPrimary
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary> 
            Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to apply primary style for FAB. 
            </summary> 
            <value> 
            <c>true</c>, if the primary style is applied for FAB component. The default value is <c>true</c>. 
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: Target
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets the selector that points to an element in which the FAB will be positioned. The default value is null where FAB is positioned based on viewport of browser. The target element must have relative position, else FAB will get positioned based on the closest element which has relative position. Simple FAB with target. ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: Visible
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary> 
            Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the FAB is visible or hidden. 
            </summary> 
            <value> 
            <c>true</c>, if the FAB is visible. The default value is <c>true</c>. 
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: Position
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary> 
            Gets or sets the value that indicates the position of the FAB relative to <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Buttons.SfFab.Target" />. 
            </summary> 
            <value> 
            One of the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Buttons.FabPosition" /> enumeration that specifies the position of FAB. The default value is <see cref="F:Syncfusion.Blazor.Buttons.FabPosition.BottomRight" />.
            </value> 
            <remarks>
            To refresh the position of FAB on <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Buttons.SfFab.Target" /> resized, use <see cref="M:Syncfusion.Blazor.Buttons.SfFab.RefreshPositionAsync" /> method. 
            The position will be refreshed automatically when browser resized.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: ChildContent
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary> 
            Gets or sets a value that indicates the child content for the Button including HTML element. If the child content is not specified, button is rendered using <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Buttons.SfButton.Content" /> property. 
            </summary> 
            <value> 
            The template content. The default value is <c>null</c>. 
            </value> 
            <remarks> 
            The child content which is specified within <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Buttons.SfButton" /> tag directive is either a string or HTML Element. The string content is also specified using <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Buttons.SfButton.Content" /> property. 
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: Content
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary> 
            Gets or sets a value that indicates the content of Button component. 
            </summary> 
            <value> 
            Accepts a string value. The default value is <c>String.Empty</c>. 
            </value> 
            <remarks> 
            Set child content within <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Buttons.SfButton" /> tag directive, to render as HTML content. 
            </remarks>

            </summary> 
            <value> 
            Accepts a CSS class string separated by space to customize the appearance of button. The default value is <c>String.Empty</c>. 
            </value>

TagHelpers.Name: Syncfusion.Blazor.Buttons.SfSpeedDial
TagHelpers.Documentation:
The Blazor SpeedDial component that appears in front of all the contents of the page and displays list of action buttons on click which is an extended version of FAB. The button of speed dial is positioned in relative to a view port of browser or . It can display a menu of related actions or a custom content . A simple SpeedDial with action items. ]]> A SpeedDial with popup template.

Feedback Form

Name

Leave Your Comments
]]>

            </summary>

            Accepts a CSS class string separated by space to include an icon or image for the button. The default value is String.Empty.
            </value> 
            <remarks> 
            If the `CloseIconCss` is <c>String.Empty</c>, then the <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Buttons.SfSpeedDial.OpenIconCss" /> is used when SpeedDial is open as well.
            </remarks>

The Blazor SpeedDial component that appears in front of all the contents of the page and displays list of action buttons on click which is an extended version of FAB. The button of speed dial is positioned in relative to a view port of browser or . It can display a menu of related actions or a custom content . BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>

            </summary> 
            <value> 
            Accepts the values between 0 and 360. The default value is <c>-1</c>>.

            </remarks>

TagHelpers.Name: Syncfusion.Blazor.RichTextEditor.ColorItemBase
TagHelpers.Documentation:
<summary>
            A class used for configuring the font or background color properties in the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.RichTextEditor.SfRichTextEditor" />.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ColorCode
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the color code in the color picker palette for content background and font color.
            </summary>
            <remarks>
            Passing <c>string.Empty</c> as a value in the array will display it as a transparant color in the palette.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: Columns
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the number of columns that is displayed on a row in the color picker palette.
            </summary>
            <value>
            The number of columns that is displayed in the color picker palette. The default value is <c>10</c>. 
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: Default
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the color value that is displayed by default in the color picker.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Mode
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the color picker default rendering palette or picker mode.
            </summary>
            <value>
            One of the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.ColorPickerMode" /> enumeration. The default value is <see cref="F:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.ColorPickerMode.Palette" />
            </value>
            <remarks>
            If the <c>ColorPickerMode</c> is <c>Palette</c>, the color picker popup display as color palette.
            If the <c>ColorPickerMode</c> is <c>Picker</c>, the color picker popup display as color picking panel.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: ModeSwitcher
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets whether to enable or disable the color picker diaplay mode switcher button. true, if the diaplay mode switcher button is enabled for color picker. otherwise, false.The default value is false.

TagHelpers.Name: Syncfusion.Blazor.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditorAudioSettings
TagHelpers.Documentation:
<summary>
            A class used for configuring the audio settings in the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.RichTextEditor.SfRichTextEditor" />.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: AllowedTypes
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets the an audio extensions that populate the allowed type of audio on browse. The list of audio types that are allowed to be uploaded. The default values are .wav, .mp3, .m4a, .wma. The File Browser allows secified extenions audio files and restricts uploading of other types of files. The following code example allows uploading of only mp3 and wav audio files. @code { List TypeList = new List() { ".mp3", ".wav" }; private List Tools = new List() { new ToolbarItemModel() { Command = ToolbarCommand.Audio } }; } ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: LayoutOption
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets whether the inserted audio/video is displayed as Inline or Break.
            </summary>
            <value>
            One of the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.RichTextEditor.DisplayLayoutOptions" /> enumeration. The default value is <see cref="F:Syncfusion.Blazor.RichTextEditor.DisplayLayoutOptions.Inline" />
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: Height
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the default height value of the audio/video when they are inserted into the editor.
            </summary>
            <value>
            This property contains height value as string. The default value is <c>auto</c>. 
            </value>
            <remarks>
            To provide the height value in pixel or percent (%) as string type.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: Path
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the Url of audio/video file save location.
            </summary>
            <value>
            The value as a Url string to save audio/video file in to server. The default value is <c>String.Empty</c>.
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: SaveFormat
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the whether the inserted audio/video is inserted as blob or base64 format.
            </summary>
            <value>
            One of the <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditorMediaSettings.SaveFormat" /> enumeration. The default value is <see cref="F:Syncfusion.Blazor.RichTextEditor.SaveFormat.Blob" />
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: SaveUrl
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the Url of save action that will receive the uploaded files and save them in the server.
            </summary>
            <value>
            The value as a Url string to save the files in to the server. The default value is <c>String.Empty</c>.
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: Width
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the width of the audio/video when they are inserted into the editor.
            </summary>
            <value>
            The width of the component in pixels or percent (%) as string type. The default value is <c>auto</c>. 
            </value>

TagHelpers.Name: Syncfusion.Blazor.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditorBackgroundColor
TagHelpers.Documentation: A class used for configuring the background color properties in the component. Configure the background color tool appearance by specifying the value for the corresponding property. In the following code example, configure the Default, ColorCode, and ModeSwitcher properties added using the tag directive. < RichTextEditorBackgroundColor ColorCode="@ColorList" ModeSwitcher="true" Default="#a5a5a5"/> @code { private List Tools = new List() { new ToolbarItemModel() { Command = ToolbarCommand.BackgroundColor } }; private Dictionary ColorList = new Dictionary() { { "Custom", new string[] { string.Empty, "#000000", "#e7e6e6", "#44546a", "#4472c4", "#ed7d31", "#a5a5a5", "#ffc000", "#70ad47", "#ff0000" } } }; } ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: Default
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>

            </summary>
            <value>

            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: ColorCode
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the color code in the color picker palette for content background and font color.
            </summary>
            <remarks>
            Passing <c>string.Empty</c> as a value in the array will display it as a transparant color in the palette.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: Columns
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the number of columns that is displayed on a row in the color picker palette.
            </summary>
            <value>
            The number of columns that is displayed in the color picker palette. The default value is <c>10</c>. 
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: Mode
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the color picker default rendering palette or picker mode.
            </summary>
            <value>
            One of the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.ColorPickerMode" /> enumeration. The default value is <see cref="F:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.ColorPickerMode.Palette" />
            </value>
            <remarks>
            If the <c>ColorPickerMode</c> is <c>Palette</c>, the color picker popup display as color palette.
            If the <c>ColorPickerMode</c> is <c>Picker</c>, the color picker popup display as color picking panel.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: ModeSwitcher
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets whether to enable or disable the color picker diaplay mode switcher button. true, if the diaplay mode switcher button is enabled for color picker. otherwise, false.The default value is false.

BoundAttributes.Name: AllowedStyleProperties
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets the list of allowed CSS style attributes when pasting in to the editor. The value is an array of string type. Allows only a provided list of CSS style attributers. Others will be removed from the pasted tags. @code { private string[] AllowedStyles = new string[] { "color", "font-size" }; } ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: DeniedAttributes
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets the list of CSS style attributes that are removed with their content when pasting text into the editor. The value is an array of string type. Restrict the provided list of arrributes alone when pasting text into the editor. @code { private string[] DeniedList = new string[] { "class", "title", "id" }; } ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: DeniedTags
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets the list of HTML tags that are removed with their content when pasting text into the editor. The value is an array of string type. Restrict the provided list of tags alone when pasting text into the editor. @code { private string[] DeniedTagList = new string[] { "a", "a[!href]" }; } ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: KeepFormat
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets whether to keep or remove the format in the copied content when pasting into the editor.
            </summary>

            <c>true</c>, if keep the same format in the copied content. The default value is <c>true</c>. 
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: PlainText
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets whether to remove text formatting when pasting content into the editor.
            </summary>
            <value>
            <c>true</c>, if remove remove text formatting in the copied content. The default value is <c>false</c>. 
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: Prompt
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets whether to show modal dialog to choose if to keep or clean the formatting in the copied content.
            </summary>
            <value>
            <c>true</c>, if show modal dialog to choose if to keep or clean the formatting. The default value is <c>false</c>. 
            </value>

            Specifies the Toolbar display types.
            The possible types are:
            - Expand: Toolbar items will be placed within the available space and rest of the items will be placed in the extended menu section.

            - Scrollable: All the toolbar items will be displayed in a single line with horizontal scrolling enabled.

TagHelpers.Name: Syncfusion.Blazor.RichTextEditor.SfRichTextEditor
TagHelpers.Documentation:
<summary>
            The Blazor Rich Text Editor is a feature-rich WYSIWYG HTML editor and WYSIWYG Markdown editor.
            The Rich Text Editor is widely used to create blogs, forum posts, notes sections, support
            tickets (incidents), comment sections, messaging applications, and more.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ID
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the unique identifier for <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.RichTextEditor.SfRichTextEditor" /> component.
            </summary>
            <value>
            Accepts a string value. The default value is <c>String.Empty</c>.
            </value>
            <remarks>
            You can specify only unique value.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: ChildContent
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
Gets or Sets the child content for the component. The template content. The default value in null. In the following code example, the content has been set to the using the property.

The Rich Text Editor component is a WYSIWYG("what you see is what you get") editor.

]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: DeniedSanitizeSelectors
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the list of denied attributes preventing when pasting into the editor.
            </summary>
            <value>
            Accepts the array of string values. The default value is empty array.
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: CssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the classes for <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.RichTextEditor.SfRichTextEditor" /> component to customize the appearance.
            One or more custom CSS classes can be added.
            </summary>
            <value>
            Accepts a CSS classes string separated by space to customize the appearance of the editor. The default value is <c>String.Empty</c>
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: EditorMode
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a value that indicates the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.RichTextEditor.SfRichTextEditor" /> allows to edit and formatting the HTML or Markdown content.
            </summary>
            <value>
            One of the <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.RichTextEditor.SfRichTextEditor.EditorMode" /> enumeration. The default value is <see cref="F:Syncfusion.Blazor.RichTextEditor.EditorMode.HTML" />
            </value>
            <remarks>
            If the <c>EditorMode</c> is <c>HTML</c>, edit HTML markup content. 
            If the <c>EditorMode</c> is <c>Markdown</c>, edit the Markdown content with markdown syntax.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: EnterKey
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a tag value that will be inserted when ENTER key is pressed.
            </summary>
            <value>
            One of the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.RichTextEditor.EnterKeyTag" /> enumeration values. The default value is <see cref="F:Syncfusion.Blazor.RichTextEditor.EnterKeyTag.P" />
            </value>
            <remarks>
            If the <c>EnterKey</c> is <c>EnterKeyTag.P</c>, new <p> tag will be inserted when ENTER key is pressed.
            If the <c>EnterKey</c> is <c>EnterKeyTag.DIV</c>, new <div> tag will be inserted when ENTER key is pressed.
            If the <c>EnterKey</c> is <c>EnterKeyTag.BR</c>, new <br> tag will be inserted when ENTER key is pressed.
            </remarks>
            <seealso cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.RichTextEditor.SfRichTextEditor.ShiftEnterKey" />

BoundAttributes.Name: ShiftEnterKey
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a tag value that will be inserted when SHIFT + ENTER key is pressed.
            </summary>
            <value>
            One of the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.RichTextEditor.ShiftEnterKeyTag" /> enumeration values. The default value is <see cref="F:Syncfusion.Blazor.RichTextEditor.ShiftEnterKeyTag.BR" />
            </value>
            <remarks>
            If the <c>ShiftEnterKey</c> is <c>ShiftEnterKeyTag.BR</c>, new <br> tag will be inserted when SHIFT + ENTER key is pressed.
            If the <c>ShiftEnterKey</c> is <c>ShiftEnterKeyTag.P</c>, new <p> tag will be inserted when SHIFT + ENTER key is pressed.
            If the <c>ShiftEnterKey</c> is <c>ShiftEnterKeyTag.DIV</c>, new <div> tag will be inserted when SHIFT + ENTER key is pressed.
            </remarks>
            <seealso cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.RichTextEditor.SfRichTextEditor.EnterKey" />

BoundAttributes.Name: EnableAutoUrl
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets whether the hyperlinks URL will automatically convert to the absolute path URL by prefixing `https://` or not. true, if hyperliks URL will automatically added prefixing `https://`; otherwise, false.The default value is false.

BoundAttributes.Name: EnableHtmlEncode
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets whether the source code is displayed with the HTML encoded format or not. true, if the source code diaply with HTML encoded format; otherwise,false.The default value is false. The encoding option applies only to the HTML editor, not to Markdown.

BoundAttributes.Name: EnableHtmlSanitizer
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets whether to allow the cross-scripting site attacks or not. true, if the eidtor content disable the cross-scripting site attacks; otherwise,false.The default value is true.

BoundAttributes.Name: EnablePersistence
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets whether to persist component's state between page reloads. When set to <c>true</c>, the <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.RichTextEditor.SfRichTextEditor.Value" /> property is persisted
            </summary>
            <value>
            <c>true</c>, if the component's state persistence is enabled. The default value is <c>false</c>.
            </value>
            <remarks>
            Component's <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.RichTextEditor.SfRichTextEditor.Value" /> property will be stored in browser local storage to persist component's state when page reloads.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: EnableResize
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets whether the Rich Text Editor content area allow to resize or not.
            </summary>
            <value>
            <c>true</c>, if the Rich Text Editor content area allows as resizable. The default value is <c>false</c>.
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: AutoSaveOnIdle
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets whether the content is saved if the editor is idle for the number of milliseconds specified in the property or not. true, if the editor is idle for the number of milliseconds specified in the property otherwise,false. The default value is false.

BoundAttributes.Name: EnableRtl
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets whether the right to left direction is enabled for <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.RichTextEditor.SfRichTextEditor" /> component.
            </summary>
            <value>
            <c>true</c>, if the right to left direction is enabled for <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.RichTextEditor.SfRichTextEditor" /> component. The default value is <c>false</c>.
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: EnableTabKey
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets whether the Tab key action works within the editor content or not. true, if the Tab key action works within the editor content otherwise,false. The default value is false.

BoundAttributes.Name: EnableXhtml
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets whether the editor’s content is valid XHTML format or not. true, if the editor content is valid XHML format otherwise,false. The default value is false. To get valid XHTML format of content, use the public method .

BoundAttributes.Name: Enabled
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets whether the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.RichTextEditor.SfRichTextEditor" /> component is enabled or not.
            </summary>
            <value>
            <c>true</c>, if the Rich Text Editor component is enabled. The default value is <c>true</c>.
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: FloatingToolbarOffset
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets offset top value to preserves the toolbar of the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.RichTextEditor.SfRichTextEditor" /> on scrolling.
            </summary>
            <value>
            This property contains offset top value as double type. The default value is <c>0</c>. 
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Documentation:

            </summary>
            <value>

            </value>
            <remarks>
            To provide the height value in pixel or percent (%) as string type.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: HtmlAttributes
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Allows additional HTML attributes such as title, name, etc., and
            It will be accepts n number of attributes in a key-value pair format.
            </summary>
            <exclude />

BoundAttributes.Name: KeyConfigure
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets the keyboard shortcuts key configuration in the . @code { ShortcutKeys shortcutKeys = new ShortcutKeys() { Bold = "ctrl+d" }; } ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: MaxLength
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets the maximum number of characters allowed to type in the component. The number of characters allowed to type in the editor. The default value is -1, means no limitation. While copy and pasting the content into the editor, allowed to paste characters remaining will truncate. ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: Placeholder
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets the text that is displayed when the component has no content and remove on the focus. The text that is displayed when the component has no content. The default value is String.Empty. ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: Readonly
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a value indicating whether content in the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.RichTextEditor.SfRichTextEditor" /> component is read-only.
            </summary>
            <value>
            <c>true</c> if the Rich Text Editor component is read-only; otherwise, <c>false</c>. The default is <c>false</c>.
            </value>
            <remarks>
            When this property is set to <c>true</c>, the contents of the component cannot be changed by the user interaction. But, you can set the value of the <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.RichTextEditor.SfRichTextEditor.Value" /> property in code.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: SaveInterval
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets an interval time to automatically make a save request after a specified time in the editor. The change event will be triggered if the content was changed from the last saved interval. The number of miliseconds of interval time to automatically make a save request in the . The default is 10000 miliseconds. The event will be triggered with every save request if the content was changed in the editor from the last saved interval. ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: ShowCharCount
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a value that shows or hides the character counter at the bottom of the editor.
            </summary>
            <value>
            <c>true</c> if the character counter shows at the bottom of the editor; otherwise, <c>false</c>. The default is <c>false</c>.
            </value>
            <seealso cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.RichTextEditor.SfRichTextEditor.MaxLength" />

BoundAttributes.Name: UndoRedoSteps
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets the number of undo and redo history steps count, which is stored in the undo and redo stack. The number of steps to stored in the undo and redo stack. The default value is 30. ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: UndoRedoTimer
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets the idle time in milliseconds stored in the undo stack after stopping typing in the editor. The number of miliseconds of idle time to be stored in the undo stack after stop typing in the editor. The default is 300 miliseconds. ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: Value
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
Gets or sets the current content of the Rich Text Editor. The content displayed in the Rich Text Editor component. @code { string rteValue = "

The Rich Text Editor component is a WYSIWYG('what you see is what you get') editor.

"; } ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: Width
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets the width of the Rich Text Editor. The width of the component in pixels or percent (%) as string type. The default value is 100%. ]]>

<summary>
            Gets or sets offset top value to preserves the toolbar of the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.RichTextEditor.SfRichTextEditor" /> on scrolling.
            </summary>
            <value>
            This property contains offset top value as double type. The default value is <c>0</c>. 
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: Height
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Get or sets the height of the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.RichTextEditor.SfRichTextEditor" /> component.
            </summary>
            <value>
            This property contains height value as string. The default value is <c>auto</c>. 
            </value>
            <remarks>
            To provide the height value in pixel or percent (%) as string type.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: HtmlAttributes
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Allows additional HTML attributes such as title, name, etc., and
            It will be accepts n number of attributes in a key-value pair format.
            </summary>
            <exclude />

BoundAttributes.Name: KeyConfigure
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets the keyboard shortcuts key configuration in the . @code { ShortcutKeys shortcutKeys = new ShortcutKeys() { Bold = "ctrl+d" }; } ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: MaxLength
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets the maximum number of characters allowed to type in the component. The number of characters allowed to type in the editor. The default value is -1, means no limitation. While copy and pasting the content into the editor, allowed to paste characters remaining will truncate. ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: Placeholder
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets the text that is displayed when the component has no content and remove on the focus. The text that is displayed when the component has no content. The default value is String.Empty. ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: Readonly
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a value indicating whether content in the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.RichTextEditor.SfRichTextEditor" /> component is read-only.
            </summary>
            <value>
            <c>true</c> if the Rich Text Editor component is read-only; otherwise, <c>false</c>. The default is <c>false</c>.
            </value>
            <remarks>
            When this property is set to <c>true</c>, the contents of the component cannot be changed by the user interaction. But, you can set the value of the <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.RichTextEditor.SfRichTextEditor.Value" /> property in code.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: SaveInterval
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets an interval time to automatically make a save request after a specified time in the editor. The change event will be triggered if the content was changed from the last saved interval. The number of miliseconds of interval time to automatically make a save request in the . The default is 10000 miliseconds. The event will be triggered with every save request if the content was changed in the editor from the last saved interval. ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: ShowCharCount
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a value that shows or hides the character counter at the bottom of the editor.
            </summary>
            <value>
            <c>true</c> if the character counter shows at the bottom of the editor; otherwise, <c>false</c>. The default is <c>false</c>.
            </value>
            <seealso cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.RichTextEditor.SfRichTextEditor.MaxLength" />

BoundAttributes.Name: UndoRedoSteps
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets the number of undo and redo history steps count, which is stored in the undo and redo stack. The number of steps to stored in the undo and redo stack. The default value is 30. ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: UndoRedoTimer
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets the idle time in milliseconds stored in the undo stack after stopping typing in the editor. The number of miliseconds of idle time to be stored in the undo stack after stop typing in the editor. The default is 300 miliseconds. ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: Value
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
Gets or sets the current content of the Rich Text Editor. The content displayed in the Rich Text Editor component. @code { string rteValue = "

The Rich Text Editor component is a WYSIWYG('what you see is what you get') editor.

"; } ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: Width
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets the width of the Rich Text Editor. The width of the component in pixels or percent (%) as string type. The default value is 100%. ]]>

TagHelpers.Name: Syncfusion.Blazor.RichTextEditor.SfRichTextEditor.ChildContent
TagHelpers.Documentation:
Gets or Sets the child content for the component. The template content. The default value in null. In the following code example, the content has been set to the using the property.

The Rich Text Editor component is a WYSIWYG("what you see is what you get") editor.

]]>

TagHelpers.Documentation:
Gets or Sets the child content for the component. The template content. The default value in null. In the following code example, the content has been set to the using the property.

The Rich Text Editor component is a WYSIWYG("what you see is what you get") editor.

]]>

            </summary>

            Component for executing complex list items common functionalities.
            </summary>
            <typeparam name="TValue">The generic type parameter.</typeparam>

            </summary>
